alert.note: Alert for Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 21 at 12:46PM PST until January 23 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SUNDAY TO 4 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In California, Death Valley National Park. In Nevada, Western Clark and Southern Nye County. * WHEN...From 10 AM Sunday to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Western Clark and Southern Nye County
